channel.title: üè¢ Zhejiang University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Zhejiang University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Consistency-Aware Spot-Guided Transformer for Versatile and Hierarchical Point Cloud Registration
item.description: CAST: a novel consistency-aware spot-guided Transformer achieves state-of-the-art accuracy and efficiency in point cloud registration.

item.title: A Global Depth-Range-Free Multi-View Stereo Transformer Network with Pose Embedding
item.description: Depth-range-free MVS network using pose embedding achieves robust and accurate 3D reconstruction.

item.title: A2PO: Towards Effective Offline Reinforcement Learning from an Advantage-aware Perspective
item.description: A2PO: A novel offline RL method tackles constraint conflicts in mixed-quality datasets by disentangling behavior policies with a conditional VAE and optimizing advantage-aware constraints, achieving s…

item.title: Action Imitation in Common Action Space for Customized Action Image Synthesis
item.description: TwinAct: Decoupling actions and actors for customizable text-guided action image generation.

item.title: Ada-MSHyper: Adaptive Multi-Scale Hypergraph Transformer for Time Series Forecasting
item.description: Ada-MSHyper: A novel adaptive multi-scale hypergraph transformer significantly boosts time series forecasting accuracy by modeling group-wise interactions and handling complex temporal variations.

item.title: Advancing Training Efficiency of Deep Spiking Neural Networks through Rate-based Backpropagation
item.description: Rate-based backpropagation boosts deep spiking neural network training efficiency by leveraging rate coding, achieving comparable performance to BPTT with reduced complexity.

item.title: Agent Planning with World Knowledge Model
item.description: This paper introduces a parametric World Knowledge Model (WKM) to improve AI agent planning by integrating both global task knowledge and dynamic state knowledge, thereby overcoming current LLMs’ limi…

item.title: Approximated Orthogonal Projection Unit: Stabilizing Regression Network Training Using Natural Gradient
item.description: AOPU: A novel neural network achieves superior stability in regression network training by approximating the natural gradient, minimizing variance estimation, and enhancing robustness.

item.title: Association Pattern-aware Fusion for Biological Entity Relationship Prediction
item.description: Pattern-BERP, a novel method, boosts biological entity relationship prediction accuracy by 4-23% using association pattern-aware fusion, enhancing interpretability for real-world applications.

item.title: BELM: Bidirectional Explicit Linear Multi-step Sampler for Exact Inversion in Diffusion Models
item.description: O-BELM, a novel diffusion model sampler, achieves mathematically exact inversion with superior sampling quality, offering a new gold standard for diffusion model applications.

item.title: Bridge-IF: Learning Inverse Protein Folding with Markov Bridges
item.description: Bridge-IF, a novel generative diffusion model, excels at inverse protein folding by learning probabilistic dependencies between protein structures and sequences, significantly outperforming existing m…

item.title: Can Graph Neural Networks Expose Training Data Properties? An Efficient Risk Assessment Approach
item.description: New efficient attack reveals GNN model training data properties.

item.title: Chat-Scene: Bridging 3D Scene and Large Language Models with Object Identifiers
item.description: Chat-Scene: Bridging 3D scenes and LLMs using object identifiers for efficient, object-level interaction and improved scene comprehension.

item.title: Con4m: Context-aware Consistency Learning Framework for Segmented Time Series Classification
item.description: Con4m, a novel consistency learning framework, leverages contextual information to effectively classify segmented time series with inconsistent boundary labels and varying durations of classes, signif…

item.title: Context and Geometry Aware Voxel Transformer for Semantic Scene Completion
item.description: CGFormer: a novel voxel transformer boosting semantic scene completion accuracy by using context-aware queries and 3D deformable attention, outperforming existing methods on SemanticKITTI and SSCBench…

item.title: Continuously Learning, Adapting, and Improving: A Dual-Process Approach to Autonomous Driving
item.description: LeapAD, a novel autonomous driving paradigm, uses a dual-process architecture mirroring human cognition to achieve continuous learning and improved adaptability. Employing a VLM for efficient scene u…

item.title: Data-faithful Feature Attribution: Mitigating Unobservable Confounders via Instrumental Variables
item.description: Data-faithful feature attribution tackles misinterpretations from unobservable confounders by using instrumental variables to train confounder-free models, leading to more robust and accurate feature …

item.title: DataStealing: Steal Data from Diffusion Models in Federated Learning with Multiple Trojans
item.description: Attackers can steal massive private data from federated learning diffusion models using multiple Trojans and an advanced attack, AdaSCP, which circumvents existing defenses.

item.title: DECRL: A Deep Evolutionary Clustering Jointed Temporal Knowledge Graph Representation Learning Approach
item.description: DECRL: A novel deep learning approach for temporal knowledge graph representation learning, capturing high-order correlation evolution and outperforming existing methods.

item.title: Delving into the Reversal Curse: How Far Can Large Language Models Generalize?
item.description: Large language models struggle to generalize knowledge when facing seemingly simple reversals, a phenomenon termed the ‘reversal curse.’ This study reveals that this limitation is strongly linked to t…

item.title: DiffPano: Scalable and Consistent Text to Panorama Generation with Spherical Epipolar-Aware Diffusion
item.description: DiffPano generates scalable, consistent, and diverse panoramic images from text descriptions and camera poses using a novel spherical epipolar-aware diffusion model.

item.title: DMNet: Self-comparison Driven Model for Subject-independent Seizure Detection
item.description: DMNet: A novel self-comparison driven model significantly improves subject-independent seizure detection from intracranial EEG, outperforming existing methods.

item.title: DreamMesh4D: Video-to-4D Generation with Sparse-Controlled Gaussian-Mesh Hybrid Representation
item.description: DreamMesh4D: Generating high-fidelity dynamic 3D meshes from monocular video using a novel Gaussian-mesh hybrid representation and adaptive hybrid skinning.

item.title: DRIP: Unleashing Diffusion Priors for Joint Foreground and Alpha Prediction in Image Matting
item.description: DRIP: A novel image matting method using pre-trained latent diffusion models achieves state-of-the-art performance by jointly predicting foreground and alpha values, significantly improving accuracy a…

item.title: Dual-Perspective Activation: Efficient Channel Denoising via Joint Forward-Backward Criterion for Artificial Neural Networks
item.description: Dual-Perspective Activation (DPA) efficiently denoises ANN channels by jointly using forward and backward propagation criteria, improving sparsity and accuracy.

item.title: Enhancing LLM Reasoning via Vision-Augmented Prompting
item.description: Vision-Augmented Prompting (VAP) boosts LLM reasoning by automatically generating images from textual problem descriptions, incorporating visual-spatial clues to significantly improve accuracy across …

item.title: Enhancing LLM‚Äôs Cognition via Structurization
item.description: LLMs struggle with complex, long-form text. This paper introduces ‘context structurization,’ transforming unstructured text into a structured format to enhance LLM comprehension. Experiments across …

item.title: Enhancing Multiple Dimensions of Trustworthiness in LLMs via Sparse Activation Control
item.description: Boosting LLM trustworthiness, researchers introduce Sparse Activation Control, a training-free method that concurrently enhances safety, factuality, and bias mitigation by selectively controlling atte…

item.title: Enhancing Semi-Supervised Learning via Representative and Diverse Sample Selection
item.description: RDSS: a novel sample selection method for semi-supervised learning, boosts model accuracy by minimizing a-MMD, striking a balance between sample representativeness and diversity.

item.title: Epipolar-Free 3D Gaussian Splatting for Generalizable Novel View Synthesis
item.description: eFreeSplat: a novel, epipolar-free 3D Gaussian splatting model for generalizable novel view synthesis, surpassing state-of-the-art methods by achieving superior geometry reconstruction and novel view …

item.title: Extending Multi-modal Contrastive Representations
item.description: Ex-MCR: Efficiently build unified multi-modal representations by extending, not connecting, pre-trained spaces, achieving superior performance with less paired data and training.

item.title: Extracting Training Data from Molecular Pre-trained Models
item.description: Researchers reveal a high risk of training data extraction from molecular pre-trained models, challenging the assumption that model sharing alone adequately protects against data theft.

item.title: FashionR2R: Texture-preserving Rendered-to-Real Image Translation with Diffusion Models
item.description: FashionR2R leverages diffusion models to realistically translate rendered fashion images into photorealistic counterparts, enhancing realism and preserving fine-grained clothing textures.

item.title: FOOGD: Federated Collaboration for Both Out-of-distribution Generalization and Detection
item.description: FOOGD: A novel federated learning framework that simultaneously tackles out-of-distribution generalization and detection by estimating probability density for reliable global distribution guidance.

item.title: FreeLong: Training-Free Long Video Generation with SpectralBlend Temporal Attention
item.description: FreeLong: Generate high-fidelity long videos without retraining using spectral blending of global and local video features!

item.title: Frieren: Efficient Video-to-Audio Generation Network with Rectified Flow Matching
item.description: FRIEREN: a novel video-to-audio generation network using rectified flow matching achieves state-of-the-art performance by improving audio quality, temporal alignment, and generation efficiency.

item.title: Graph Diffusion Policy Optimization
item.description: GDPO: A novel method optimizes graph diffusion models for any objective using reinforcement learning, achieving state-of-the-art performance in diverse graph generation tasks.

item.title: Harmonizing Stochasticity and Determinism: Scene-responsive Diverse Human Motion Prediction
item.description: DiMoP3D: Predicting diverse, physically realistic human motions in 3D scenes by harmonizing stochasticity and determinism.

item.title: Improved Regret for Bandit Convex Optimization with Delayed Feedback
item.description: A novel algorithm, D-FTBL, achieves improved regret bounds for bandit convex optimization with delayed feedback, tightly matching existing lower bounds in worst-case scenarios.

item.title: Information Re-Organization Improves Reasoning in Large Language Models
item.description: InfoRE: A novel method improving large language models’ reasoning by reorganizing information to highlight logical relationships, resulting in a 4% average accuracy boost across various tasks.

item.title: Knowledge Circuits in Pretrained Transformers
item.description: Researchers unveil ‘knowledge circuits’ within LLMs, revealing how knowledge is collaboratively encoded and utilized, leading to improved LLM design and interpretations of model behavior.

item.title: Learning Complete Protein Representation by Dynamically Coupling of Sequence and Structure
item.description: CoupleNet dynamically links protein sequences and structures for improved representations, surpassing state-of-the-art methods in function prediction, particularly for uncommon proteins.

item.title: Learning-Augmented Algorithms for the Bahncard Problem
item.description: PFSUM, a novel learning-augmented algorithm, leverages short-term predictions to achieve superior performance in solving the Bahncard problem, outperforming existing methods with improved consistency …

item.title: LG-CAV: Train Any Concept Activation Vector with Language Guidance
item.description: LG-CAV: Train any Concept Activation Vector with Language Guidance, leverages vision-language models to train CAVs without labeled data, achieving superior accuracy and enabling state-of-the-art model…

item.title: Locating What You Need: Towards Adapting Diffusion Models to OOD Concepts In-the-Wild
item.description: CATOD framework improves text-to-image generation by actively learning high-quality training data to accurately depict out-of-distribution concepts.

item.title: MaskFactory: Towards High-quality Synthetic Data Generation for Dichotomous Image Segmentation
item.description: MaskFactory generates high-quality synthetic data for dichotomous image segmentation, improving model training efficiency and accuracy.

item.title: MimicTalk: Mimicking a personalized and expressive 3D talking face in minutes
item.description: MimicTalk generates realistic, expressive talking videos in minutes using a pre-trained model adapted to individual identities.

item.title: MKGL: Mastery of a Three-Word Language
item.description: Researchers taught a large language model (LLM) a three-word ‘Knowledge Graph Language’ (KGL) to improve knowledge graph (KG) completion, drastically reducing errors compared to other methods.

item.title: Model LEGO: Creating Models Like Disassembling and Assembling Building Blocks
item.description: Model LEGO (MDA) revolutionizes deep learning by enabling the creation of new models by assembling and disassembling task-aware components from pre-trained models, eliminating the need for retraining.

item.title: MoMu-Diffusion: On Learning Long-Term Motion-Music Synchronization and Correspondence
item.description: MoMu-Diffusion: a novel framework that learns long-term motion-music synchronization, generating realistic and beat-matched sequences surpassing existing methods.

item.title: On Convergence of Adam for Stochastic Optimization under Relaxed Assumptions
item.description: Adam optimizer achieves near-optimal convergence in non-convex scenarios with unbounded gradients and relaxed noise assumptions, improving its theoretical understanding and practical application.

item.title: Parallelizing Model-based Reinforcement Learning Over the Sequence Length
item.description: PaMoRL framework boosts model-based reinforcement learning speed by parallelizing model and policy learning stages over sequence length, maintaining high sample efficiency.

item.title: PhyloGen: Language Model-Enhanced Phylogenetic Inference via Graph Structure Generation
item.description: PhyloGen uses a genomic language model to generate and optimize phylogenetic trees, offering faster and more accurate evolutionary analysis than traditional methods.

item.title: PointAD: Comprehending 3D Anomalies from Points and Pixels for Zero-shot 3D Anomaly Detection
item.description: PointAD: a novel zero-shot 3D anomaly detection method using CLIP’s strong generalization abilities to identify anomalies in unseen objects by transferring knowledge from both points and pixels.

item.title: PowerPM: Foundation Model for Power Systems
item.description: PowerPM: A foundation model revolutionizing power system analysis by mastering complex ETS data through a novel self-supervised pre-training approach, achieving state-of-the-art performance.

item.title: PSL: Rethinking and Improving Softmax Loss from Pairwise Perspective for Recommendation
item.description: Pairwise Softmax Loss (PSL) improves recommendation accuracy by enhancing Softmax Loss (SL) with alternative activation functions, resulting in tighter ranking metric surrogates and better noise resis…

item.title: Rethinking the Diffusion Models for Missing Data Imputation: A Gradient Flow Perspective
item.description: NewImp boosts diffusion models’ missing data imputation by curbing sample diversity and eliminating data masking, achieving superior accuracy.

item.title: Scene Graph Generation with Role-Playing Large Language Models
item.description: SDSGG outperforms leading scene graph generation methods by using LLMs to create scene-specific descriptions, adapting to diverse visual relations.

item.title: Simple and Fast Distillation of Diffusion Models
item.description: Simple and Fast Distillation (SFD) drastically accelerates diffusion model training by 1000x, achieving state-of-the-art results in few-step image generation with minimal fine-tuning.

item.title: Solving Zero-Sum Markov Games with Continous State via Spectral Dynamic Embedding
item.description: SDEPO, a new natural policy gradient algorithm, efficiently solves zero-sum Markov games with continuous state spaces, achieving near-optimal convergence independent of state space cardinality.

item.title: Spec-Gaussian: Anisotropic View-Dependent Appearance for 3D Gaussian Splatting
item.description: Spec-Gaussian enhances 3D Gaussian splatting by using anisotropic spherical Gaussians for view-dependent appearance modeling, achieving superior real-time rendering of scenes with specular and anisotr…

item.title: TFGDA: Exploring Topology and Feature Alignment in Semi-supervised Graph Domain Adaptation through Robust Clustering
item.description: TFGDA: Leveraging graph topology and feature alignment for superior semi-supervised domain adaptation.

item.title: TOPA: Extending Large Language Models for Video Understanding via Text-Only Pre-Alignment
item.description: TOPA: Extending LLMs for video understanding using only text data.

item.title: TopoFR: A Closer Look at Topology Alignment on Face Recognition
item.description: TopoFR enhances face recognition by aligning topological structures between input and latent spaces. Using persistent homology, it preserves crucial data structure info, overcoming overfitting. A har…

item.title: Towards Unified Multimodal Editing with Enhanced Knowledge Collaboration
item.description: UniKE: A unified multimodal editing method achieves superior reliability, generality, and locality by disentangling knowledge into semantic and truthfulness spaces, enabling enhanced collaboration bet…

item.title: Unified Generative and Discriminative Training for Multi-modal Large Language Models
item.description: Unified generative-discriminative training boosts multimodal large language models (MLLMs)! Sugar, a novel approach, leverages dynamic sequence alignment and a triple kernel to enhance global and fin…

item.title: UniIF: Unified Molecule Inverse Folding
item.description: UniIF: A unified model revolutionizes molecule inverse folding, achieving state-of-the-art results across protein, RNA, and material design by employing a novel geometric block attention network.

item.title: Unleashing the Potential of the Diffusion Model in Few-shot Semantic Segmentation
item.description: DiffewS: a novel framework leverages diffusion models for few-shot semantic segmentation, significantly outperforming existing methods in multiple settings.

item.title: Vision-Language Navigation with Energy-Based Policy
item.description: Energy-based Navigation Policy (ENP) revolutionizes Vision-Language Navigation by modeling joint state-action distributions, achieving superior performance across diverse benchmarks.

item.title: WISE: Rethinking the Knowledge Memory for Lifelong Model Editing of Large Language Models
item.description: WISE, a novel dual-memory architecture, solves the impossible triangle of reliability, generalization, and locality in lifelong LLM editing by employing a side memory for knowledge updates and a route…

item.title: ZipCache: Accurate and Efficient KV Cache Quantization with Salient Token Identification
item.description: ZipCache: Efficient KV cache quantization for LLMs using salient token identification, achieving 4.98x compression with minimal accuracy loss!
